messages.title: GENERAL ELECTION SPECIAL!
messages.content: I am so excited about this election. We are running the biggest and most energetic campaign in our history. Whoever we elect will shape not just the next few months, but the next five years and beyond. Traditional political parties are failing us and our planet. Now is the time to vote for our values. I love this area and I would be honoured to be elected to represent our amazing community.

mentions.candidate: Hannah Temple lives in Faversham, is a Trustee at the Abbey Physic Community Garden and an active local volunteer.

images.caption: Hannah Temple for Faversham and Mid Kent

leaflet.additionalNotes: JOIN OUR PEOPLE'S ASSEMBLY! WEST FAVERSHAM COMMUNITY CENTRE 22ND NOV 7-9PM
